Text: ThankyouDr Kaminski I enjoyed our discussion this morning It sounds like there is a great deal of overlap between Enron business units and my interests I am very much looking forward to meeting you and your colleagues Thankyou for the invitation to interview with your group Sincerely Rodney Greene work home
